projectatlast.query

Class QueryFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • projectatlast.query.QueryFactory

  • public class QueryFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory to create queries out of string parameters received from the front-end.
    Version:
    2011-12-07
    Author:
    Erik De Smedt, Mattias Buelens

    • Method Detail

      • createQuery

        public Query createQuery(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionMap,
                java.util.List<java.lang.String> groupIds)
        Create a query with options from the given option map and groups from the given groups list.

        The option map can contain the following keys:

        • student
          usage
          Only select activities from a certain student.
          value
          "current","currentuser","currentstudent"
        • kind
          usage
          Only select a certain kind of activities.
          value
          "study" for study activities, "freetime" for free time activities.
        • startdate
          usage
          Only keep activities after a given date.
          value
          Date string in the format "dd-MM-yyyy".
        • stopdate
          usage
          Only keep activities before a given date.
          value
          Date string in the format "dd-MM-yyyy".
        • course
          usage
          Only select study activities for a certain course.
          value
          Course identifier as given by Course.getId().
        Parameters:
        optionMap - The option map.
        groupIds - List of group identifiers.

      • getOptions

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getOptions(Query query)
        Creates an option map from the given query.
